title: What is being built on the 17 by Lowes in Surf City and by Eastern Outfitters in Hampstead?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/built-hampstead-near-site-eastern-outfitters/ Hello. Here's another: http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/going-near-lowes-surf-city/
